ygData.subject: RE: EQ plat was: Elf Hide gloves : was trading the stei n comments
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, for me personally Unrest has been great for cash.  What I generally do is spend about 4 hours there and leave with 3 FS weapons, a couple pieces of
ygData.messageBody:
Well, for me personally Unrest has been great for cash. What I generally do
is spend about 4 hours there and leave with 3 FS weapons, a couple pieces of
bronze armor, some jade or other stones, some words, 1 rare drop like the
thick apron, or savants cap and about 10pp or so in coin. I have 100STR and
I am not a monk so I can go right up to my weight limit, usually can carry
over 30units of weight worth of crap before I start to go over the limit and
notice adverse affects on my stats.

I then go to Kelethin and sell the bronze for about 2pp per AC point, sell
the rare drop for what I can get for it (around 20pp) and then sell the FS
and misc loot to my bard guild who I am amiable with and I have a 110CHA.
At 3-6pp per FS weapon and 10-20 or so per bronze plus the rare drop plus
the cash coin I looted, I can make around 50pp - but don't get me wrong, I
do have to work for it...and it does take about 4 hours and some luck.

I am level 24 an I can only seem to maintain around 300 plat and I am still
in mostly banded armor and wielding a Dragoon dirk and a Pugius dagger so
I'm not really bragging.

Faras "the blue collar bard" Tar'Linedhel

> -----Original Message-----
> From: JasonF [mailto:JasonF@...]
> Sent: Thursday, August 19, 1999 9:38 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] EQ plat was: Elf Hide gloves : was trading the
> stei n comments
>
>
> From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
>
> I think a lot of you people gushing about how easy it is to
> make money via
> loot are exaggerating. I have a 23rd monk that works his
> butt off and he's
> never had more than about 125pp in the bank at any one time.
> I've spent time
> in unrest. Where's the money there? FS weapons? The cash
> drops aren't
> *that* great.
>
> So if you have some advice for a player that is really tired
> of reading about
> how others have more than 1,000pp in the bank, let 'er rip.
>
> Aggrevated,
>
> Yoyodyne on Fennin Ro
>
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Chris Kuenster (Entex) <v-ntxck@...>
> To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Thursday, August 19, 1999 9:21 AM
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] EQ plat was: Elf Hide gloves : was
> trading the stei n
> comments
>
>
> > From: "Chris Kuenster (Entex)" <v-ntxck@...>
> >
> > Aye, its all relative. Plats are very easy to get even
> after level 20. I
> > have never had less than 100 in the bank since then and
> almost always over
> > 1000. Today I am buying Blk Pearl Plat earrings and will
> have up to 1000 to
> > blow on failures and if they all fail the only thing thats
> a pain is getting
> > 4 more BPs to play with. Replacing the 1000 is really easy.
> This is why I
> > love the bazaars, I trade basically useless Plats for
> awesome items I or my
> > friends can actually use, what a great concept.
> >
>
>
